[睘]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ɡʷeŋ ): semantic 目 ( “ eye ” ) + phonetic 袁 ( OC *ɢʷan ) ; 袁 is often abbreviated.

[還]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ɡʷraːn, *sɢʷan ): semantic 辵 ( “ walk ” ) + phonetic 睘 ( OC *ɡʷeŋ ) – to go back; to return.

[还]
simplified and variant form of 還
